original_text: After he had buried his father, Joseph returned to Egypt with his brothers and all who had gone up with him to bury his father.
korean_text: 요셉이 아버지를 장사한 후에 자기 형제와 호상꾼과 함께 애굽으로 돌아왔더라

sentences.original_text: After he had buried his father,
Joseph returned to Egypt with his brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 요셉은 그의 형들과 함께 이집트로 돌아왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and with all who had gone up with him to bury his father.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아버지를 장사 지내기 위해 그와 함께 올라갔던 모든 사람과 함께
